instanceVariables.name: scrollCanvasID
instanceVariables.desc: enter canvasID - you need to enter one, but you don't need to enable masking

instanceVariables.name: scrollCanvasMask
instanceVariables.desc: mask this object (and children) behind canvas

instanceVariables.name: scrollAffectPosition
instanceVariables.desc: usually true but in some cases you may want this to be false, for example when this is a child of another uiScrollComponent, like a slider handle

instanceVariables.name: scrollCenterOnChosen
instanceVariables.desc: center this component when it gets chosen in the scroll view

instanceVariables.name: scrollCenterOnMouseover
instanceVariables.desc: same thing as onChosen, but works for mouse too

instanceVariables.name: scrollCenteringMargins
instanceVariables.desc: margins around centering this component, if set to center on chosen

instanceVariables.name: scrollOffsetX
instanceVariables.desc: the offset between this object and the canvas

instanceVariables.name: scrollOffsetY
instanceVariables.desc: the offset between this object and the canvas
